subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jarvis Landry made a spectacular one-handed touchdown catch, and No. 8 Louisiana State kept its Bowl Championship Series hopes alive with a 20-13 win at Arkansas on Friday.
snippet: Jarvis Landry made a spectacular one-handed touchdown catch, and No. 8 Louisiana State kept its Bowl Championship Series hopes alive with a 20-13 win at Arkansas on Friday.
